attributes.action: knight Neil Mackenzie for his years of service bringing pleasure to women across the globe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Neil 'Big Mac' Mackenzie is many things...

Gentleman, cad, bounder, rogue, scoundrel, lothario, libertine, heartbreaker, wooer, seducer, romeo, prince charming, casanova, rascal etc.

He is all things to all women. 

It is high time that Neil Mackenzie becomes Sir Neil Mackenzie!!! 

N.B. He may not have as much money as others your government has knighted but he is a member of the Labour supporters network. Neil Mackenzie is against sleaze in politics!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
